snippet: General Momyer was a famed World War II fighter pilot who would go on to command aerial combat and bombing operations during the early years of the Vietnam War.
abstract: Gen William W Momyer, celebrated World War II fighter pilot whose career ultimately spanned three decades and battles in Africa, Europe and Vietnam, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: General Momyer was a famed World War II fighter pilot who would go on to command aerial combat and bombing operations during the early years of the Vietnam War.

headline.main: Gen. William W. Momyer, Celebrated Pilot, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Gen. William W. Momyer, Celebrated Pilot, Dies at 95
